hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Zam`a:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "None of you should flog his wife as he flogs a slave and then have sexual intercourse with her in the last part of the day

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنْ ضَرْبِ النِّسَاءِ وَقَوْلِهِ {وَاضْرِبُوهُنَّ} ضَرْبًا غَيْرَ مُبَرِّحٍ.
chapter.eng-name: The beating of women is disapproved
